name: Another Sonic.exe Fan Game ( 2.0 )
description:
SONIC.EXE IS BACK!

Thanks to all the Youtubers playing my game I decided to do a FULL update with lots of new stuff, here's a list of things:

- Each character has a new level

- Tails Can Fly!

- New Endings

- Better Atmosphere

- Amazing Secrets

- Original Soundtrack made by "João Joga!"

- AND MUCH MORE YOU CAN DISCOVER PLAYING!

Welcome to Round 2!
